hero.headline: Empowering Farmers with Data-Driven Insights
hero.subHeadline: Plan smarter, harvest better, and connect directly with buyers. Farmlytics brings modern analytics to your farm.
hero.taglinePlaceholder: Unlock your farm's full potential with data-driven insights and smart planning.

main.subword: Join Farmlytics today and start cultivating success with smart, data-driven insights

features.title: How System Works
features.subtitle: Comprehensive tools designed specifically for modern farmers to maximize productivity and profitability.

cropPlanner.title: Personalized Crop Planner
cropPlanner.description: Get AI-powered recommendations based on your soil, climate, and market demand to optimize your planting decisions.

marketConnection.title: Market Connection Module
marketConnection.description: Connect directly with buyers and access real-time market prices to get the best value for your harvest.

harvestTracker.title: Harvest & Revenue Tracker
harvestTracker.description: Track your yields, expenses, and revenue in one place. Understand your farm's financial health at a glance.

visualInsights.title: Visual Insights Dashboard
visualInsights.description: Beautiful charts and graphs that make complex farm data easy to understand and act upon.

exportInsights.title: Export & Share Reports
exportInsights.description: Generate professional reports to share with partners, lenders, or for your own records.

cropMonitoring.title: Crop Monitoring
cropMonitoring.description: Transforming agriculture with data. Gain real-time insights into your crops' health.

analyticsDashboard.title: Analytics Dashboard
analyticsDashboard.description: Cross-functional interface that maximizes your farm's earnings and optimizes operations.

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.description: Connecting you directly with buyers to get the best prices for your produce.

ctaSection.headline: Ready to Transform Your Farming?
ctaSection.subHeadline: Join thousands of farmers already using Farmlytics to make smarter decisions and increase their yields.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to continue your journey with fellow farmers and buyers.

password.label: Password
password.min: Password must be at least 8 characters

register.title: Create Your Account
register.subtitle: Join us today and start exploring
register.welcomeSubtitle: Start your journey with us today
register.pageSubtitle: Fill in your details to get started

firstName.label: First Name
firstName.invalid: First name must be at least 2 characters

lastName.label: Last Name
lastName.invalid: Last name must be at least 2 characters

password.label: Password
password.min: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.complexity: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number

register.termsLabel: I agree to the Terms and Privacy Policy
register.termsRequired: You must agree to the terms and privacy policy
register.error: Something went wrong, please try again.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Reset your password
forgotPassword.welcomeSubtitle: We'll help you get back to your account
forgotPassword.pageSubtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a reset link
forgotPassword.success: Password reset link sent! Check your email.
forgotPassword.error: Failed to send reset link. Please try again.
forgotPassword.successMessage: A password reset link has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox.

verifyEmail.verifyingMessage: Please wait while we confirm your email address.
verifyEmail.successMessage: Your email address has been successfully verified. You can now log in.
verifyEmail.errorMessageDefault: There was an issue verifying your email. The link might be invalid or expired.
verifyEmail.resendSuccessMessage: A new verification email has been sent to your inbox. Please check it.
verifyEmail.resendErrorMessage: Failed to resend verification email. Please try again later.
verifyEmail.initialMessage: A verification link has been sent to your email. Please check your inbox and click the link to activate your account.

cropPlanner.title: Crop Planner
